## SynQLite.synqTables property

Object containing [SyncableTable](./synqlite-node.syncabletable.md)<!-- -->s, keyed by table name.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get synqTables(): Record<string, SyncableTable> | undefined;
```

## Remarks

A [SyncableTable](./synqlite-node.syncabletable.md) structure is never modified. SynQLite maintains its own tables and triggers for tracking and responding to changes.
